item.title: WATCH: Dog loves to jump with joy
item.description: Broxi, the energetic black Labrador, literally jumps for joy as he greets people.

item.title: Amber Ruffin dropped from White House Correspondents' Association dinner
item.description: The White House Correspondents' Association announced Saturday that its annual dinner will not feature Amber Ruffin or any comedian.
